attributes.action: Sanitary products free via the NHS, have NHS supply sanitary products for free
attributes.background: Make a legal requirement for the NHS to supply sanitary products free of charge. Periods are not a choice and women have to pay a minimum of £300 a year. Other forms of medical help is supplied via NHS so should menstrual issues. Sanitary products are classed as a luxury item, change this now.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free female sanitary products for all women and girls
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756958
